result.execSummary:
The defendant Angel M. Deverney was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate with Restricted Controlled Substance (1st w/Pass.), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(am).
  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

DNA sample

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Angel M. Deverney
Current: 2411 N Morrison St, Appleton, WI 54911 United States  (Effective: 02-26-2016)
Prior: 723 1st Ave, Antigo, WI 54409 United States

Defendant Angel M. Deverney in court with attorney Geoffrey R Misfeldt.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Called @ 1:33 p.m. Agreement stated - Def will plead to cts 1 &  2, ct 1 - $150 plus costs, 5 days jail, 6 months revocation, AODA. Ct 2 - $100 plus costs. Atty Misfeldt agrees, however advises revocation will be doubled by DOT. Def agrees. Plea quest. reviewed. Plea to ct 1 - guilty. Plea to ct 2 - guilty. Constitutional rights reviewed. Off the record briefly1:43. Back on the record 1:44. Atty Misfeldt has advised Def of difference of elements of ct 1 and elements of OWI w/alcohol. Court reviews elements and possible penalties. Atty Misfeldt satisfied. Court finds Def understands and pleas freely & voluntarily made. Factual basis. Court accepts pleas and finds guilty of cts 1 & 2. Sentencing remarks by Counsel. State will not object to Court reserving right to expunge after 1 yr if no further crimes and court obligations paid. However, explains that DOT would not expunge traffic violation. Response by Atty Misfeldt. Statement by Defendant. Remarks by the Court, will follow agreement. Ct 1 $150 plus costs, 5 days jail, may serve in any other county as long as no electronic monitoring, huber. Report no later than 3/25/16 @ 6 p.m. 6 month revocation, AODA and follow through, DNA sample and surcharge. Ct 2 - $100 plus costs, DNA surcharge. Reserve right to expunge under 973.015 after 1 yr if no new crimes and court obligations paid. State had previously moved to forfeit $600 bond. Atty Misfeldt would like both bonds posted applied, but leaves to Court's discretion. Court forfeits $600 bond. $1000 bond to be applied to fines and costs. Pmt plan for balance. Postconviction rights.  Review hearing scheduled for February 28, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Request, Consent and Order for Subsitution of Attorneys for Defendant

Defendant Angel M. Deverney in court with attorney Jeffery Joy by phone.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Matter is also set for bond forfeiture hearing.  State request $600.00 bond be forfeited.  Statement by Atty Joy.  Court will forfeit bond however will hold bond until later date.  Court reviews complaint with possible penalties.  Not guilty pleas entered.  Court will accept not guilty pleas.  Atty Joy may appear by phone.  Reserve jurisdictional objections.  Bond will continue  Status conference scheduled for August 17, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Angel M. Deverney in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews file.  Matter was adjourned for def to contact an atty.  Def has contacted an atty.  State provides phone number for atty Jeff Joy.  Court will adj 1 week.  Bond will continue  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Angel M. Deverney
Current: 723 1st Ave, Antigo, WI 54409 United States  (Effective: 06-22-2015)
Prior: 5592 Kwe Da Kik, 91, Crandon, WI 54520

Defendant Angel M. Deverney in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Def has copy of complaint.  Court reads charges with possible penalties.  Def advised of right to an atty.  Def is requesting an atty.  Def has posted $1000.00 cash bond.  Def to provide current address  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant Angel M. Deverney not in court.  Ralph Malcom Uttke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves to forfeit $600 cash bond.  Bond forfeited pending hearing.
